name: SmashTown USA
description:
SmashTown is an early prototype from a group of game design students. The goat is to make a great game, but we need your feedback. Please tell us what you like, what you dislike, and what you would like to see in future iterations.

In SmashTown USA, Brock Striker needs to make his way through 1980s American Urban environments to take down an evil robotic crime led by Mr. Big. Striker is a skilled martial artist with a death wish who is fed up and is fighting back. Who is the mysterious Mr. Big, and why has he taken over SmashTown USA?

You can follow game progress at 

https://smashtown.wixsite.com/website
